thread.title: POLL: Do You Approve of Inauguration Protests?
thread.title_full: POLL: Do You Approve of Inauguration Protests?

author: Mediaite
title: POLL: Do You Approve of Inauguration Protests?
text:
POLL: Do You Approve of Inauguration Protests? by Mediaite | 2:32 pm, January 16th, 2017 
Protesting and demonstrating are foundational elements that support a functioning democracy, but so, too, is the Presidential election. Ahead of the big protests that are being planned for this weekend, when Donald Trump is sworn in as President, we have to ask… 
You know the disclaimer: This poll isn’t scientific . We just want to know! 
[image: screengrab] 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
